TopicTitle: Bobcat American Pack - Great For New Pilots To Try Docking

Articles.Content:
Seriously, this new ORION that Bobcat has made has the best balanced command and service module that I have ever flown in KSP. It makes docking a breeze and would be really good for new players who are having problems docking. It would give them a vehicle that is easy to fly and easy to dock for their first time.

God, I'm sounding like a fanboy but this really is the dog's sphericals.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-20-x-american-pack-0-1/

Here is two I docked earlier (in my best Blue Peter voice).
As anyone had a problem with Altair Descent Stage leg not working ?
